abstract: The investors in the current round of seed financing include top executives or former executives of Zillow, eHarmony, Expedia, Loopnet and Starwood Capital.
snippet: The investors in the current round of seed financing include top executives or former executives of Zillow, eHarmony, Expedia, Loopnet and Starwood Capital.
lead_paragraph: In this age of Airbnb and Craigslist, the concept of time-share resorts has become almost quaint. But one company is trying to update the sector to suit the Internet era.

headline.main: Start-Up Brings an Internet Sensibility to Time Shares
